ItemTooltips.branches: goodgame branches - there is no better item in dota 2
ItemTooltips.tango: maybe let the courier bring you some extra-healing, just to ensure you reach level 6 without dying.
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: as soon as you earned your first 250g go to the sideshop and combine your slippers of agility to the PMS by buying a stout shield
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: buying this will compensate your manaproblems and your squishiness a little.

AbilityTooltips.slark_dark_pact: if there is a stun or a DUST incomming use it as fast as possible. it will get you rid of all your debuffs. noone likes debuffs.
AbilityTooltips.slark_pounce: get this at lvl1 so you can jump on enemy heroes if there starts a go on your lane or to jump away if enemys want you dead.
AbilityTooltips.slark_essence_shift:
you will only need this once in early levels. leveling it up only affects the duration you got the bonus-agility.
as fights are quite short in early levels you wont need this higher.
